process.env.PROPERTIES: {"cdn":"/","api":"http://localhost:1/v1/","root":"http://localhost:${PORT:=8080}/","stage":"development","name":"vue-babylonjs","version":"1.0.0-beta.7","description":"A ready-to-go 3d environment for Vue.js using Babylon.js"}

{"cdn":"/","api":"http://localhost:1/v1/","root":"http://localhost:${PORT:=8080}/","stage":"development","name":"vue-babylonjs","version":"1.0.0-beta.7","description":"A ready-to-go 3d environment for Vue.js using Babylon.js"}

package.name: vue-babylonjs
package.description: A ready-to-go 3d environment for Vue.js using Babylon.js

scripts.b: CONTEXT=$(pwd) npm explore begin-build -- npm run
scripts.// build: rm -rf docs && npm run b build
scripts.dist: BABEL_ENV=dist rm -rf lib dist && npm run dist:rollup && npm run dist:uglify
scripts.watch:client: npm run watcher -- --exec 'nf run npm run b dev:client'
